website_summaries.verdict: The AOC i2367fh is an attractive 23-inch IPS monitor offering rich, accurate colors and solid grayscale performance. It doesn?t come with a lot of features but it?s still a great deal for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitors! I purchased 3 of these with some ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitors! I purchased 3 of these with some vesa adapter brackets (They are not really vesa mountable without them) and they work great! The thin bezel really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great for clean setup
customer_reviews.text: Great monitors for a nice clean setup. They are designed to be used with or without the stands which is one of the reasons I chose these monitors. I was worried that the slight matte screen would produce a more dull image, but the picture is sharp, clear, and very bright if you want it to be. For the price and even for more than the price, I am very happy with these monitors. I have had for about 6 months now without any issues. The power supply could be a little longer, but overall they are one of the best deals I've seen for a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: GREAT video, so-so audio, auto-detects inputs
customer_reviews.text: Nice crisp monitor. VESA mounting holes, clear picture. Embedded speakers were an unexpected plus, though they are not wonderful audio quality. Only gripe I have is that after I hooked up a Chromecast to one of the HDMI ports, it keeps switching to that input when the PC goes into sleep mode. As a result I have to switch input about every time I come into my home office. Should be a way to turn off auto-detect. I did like the array of input ports on the device, however. Two HDMI and a full size DisplayPort as well as VGA make for a very versatile monitor. Removing the stand to mount on a swing arm was simple.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, warranty is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen! A little more expensive than two side by side screens but it is beautiful! Text on the screen looks crystal clear. *Update 2/18/2017 Blue line appeared across the screen about 10 months into owning it. Luckily the product has a one year warranty, only this is you have to pay to ship it to them! Shipping a monitor that big costs about $40. Pretty upset that AOC doesnt stand behind their products enough to cover shipping charges to fix a manufacture fault.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The "goldilocks monitor"...
customer_reviews.text: Don't look at any other monitors. Seriously. I bought an AOC 27" at MicroCenter and ended up returning it, I never thought I would say a monitor could be too big, but really, it was...this monitor is perfect. The silver two tone looks really sharp, and the quality is great. This one DOES INCLUDE AN HDMI, unlike the 22"--really glad I checked that before I bought the smaller one. Looks great, perfect size, incredible price. What more could you want?

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: AOC is a new name to me, but I tried out this monitor and loved it immediately. I am a computer programmer, and didn't even realize how much eye strain my old Acer monitor had been causing me over the years until I placed this AOC monitor next to it. It's very bright and readable, and my eyes just seem to relax when using it versus straining to read text on my old monitor. Now I'm getting ready to order a second one of these monitors since I can't bear to look at the Acer anymore. Impressed with AOC so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deeje & Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.  Not truly "frameless", but that's all right.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor, with multiple inputs. Resolution is good. It is not however "Frameless". Interestingly enough, there is a sticker on the monitor that reads "WARNING. Do not rip off the panel film". I am tempted of course, but have resisted so far. I think the film lends credence to the "frameless" claim. There is about a 10 millimeter frame that is behind the film, giving the appearance of "frameless"....if you don't try to expand the viewing widow to the true edge of the monitor. A small nit, and no worse than other monitors. I have fairly new ViewSonic which has frame that is 20mm, and it cost 25 per-cent more.
customer_reviews.author: Yonaga

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly when using my 2011 MacBook Air and Thunderbolt to HDMI Cable.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Monitor. The clarity is really perfect IMO. Looks as good as my MAcBook, I just set it to mirror. After unpacking, took less than 60 seconds to have everything working. I am currently having a new SDD card, formatted with Sierra 10.13.3 so it will hopefully work with a USB port. I don't plan to upgrade unless some magic has happened and the latest Sierra OS USB to Monitor functions works again. Planning to use the Thunderbolt for a Presonus 16.0.2 Mixer. I'll keep this review updated on the progress of all this in case it might help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Burrup

customer_reviews.title: Because it wasn't completely dead though I've been able to do a side by side comparison and the picture quality on it is amazing compared to a non-LED
customer_reviews.text: For me this replaced a much much older 23" samsung that I have been using for a monitor for almost 10 years that was starting to randomly shut off. Because it wasn't completely dead though I've been able to do a side by side comparison and the picture quality on it is amazing compared to a non-LED. The ONLY drawback is that with the monitor/tv at max volume, and my computer volume at max, it is still way too quiet. External speakers are a necessity without a doubt, but in every other way I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this monitor if you intend to use it with ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this monitor if you intend to use it with HDMI. As others have reported, the monitor's screen goes black and then returns normally when it's "searching" for a signal. I have tried both the HDMI ports and check to see if it had something to do with a menu setting but to no avail. When using this monitor with VGA it behaves as expected. I would return the item but it passed the Amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: asoto

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance, but with build quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Solid image quality, on par with my lenovo z70-80 laptops screen. Deep blacks and bright whites. Build quality leaves a lot to be desired. Entire monitor is plastic. Buttons on back feel cheap. LCD panel is not secured on the sides and can be partly lifted out. But the panel itself is great, and for the price the flaws can be overlooked. Only real complaint i have that i can't overlook is a lack of a display port. Video cards today have several of these, so all monitors should have one But, if you don't need display port and are okay​ with mostly minor build quality issues, it is a solid monitor and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: harshbarj

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, but no software provided.
customer_reviews.text: AOC has stepped up its game in recent years, and its monitors are now as good as better-known brands costing more. The picture clarity is good on this, and you can get software that will directly interface with most of the manual controls, saving you the trouble of fumbling around with the buttons on the device. The two caveats I have are that this software was NOT included in the packaging, and phoning tech support got me a lesser version of the software. You'll want to go find the correct software online.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barrister

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but Color Varies Panel to Panel
customer_reviews.text: Review is for the 27" Black version: 2 HDMI, 1 VGA, 1 DisplayPort and VESA mounts? I was first skeptical with the brand, AOC, but decided to order one. Really happy I did. Now I don't have to unplug every time I switch between devices. This monitor replaced an old Samsung monitor in a 2-monitor setup; thinking of purchasing a second one for the setup. Update Jan 28, 2017. Went and bought a second display for my setup, but the new monitor is warmer (has a yellowish tint). I have the same settings and even swapped inputs and it has the same tint. Had to knock down a star since it is super annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Riggio

customer_reviews.title: Audio cannot be altered or disabled.
customer_reviews.text: The display is fine, but the audio cannot be turned up/down or disabled. If you are running an HDMI connection, this becomes a problem. The HDMI on my system is split to show on the main TV as well, so the audio needs to be in the signal. This monitor has become a real pain because of this. It would have been 1000x better to just not include the horrible tinny speaker that's in it at all. I'm replacing the monitor in less than a year of use because of this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I made a mistake and it cost me $119
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor on 8/6/2016 and here I am looking for a new monitor a year later. I have dark vertical stripes on the sides and shadows everywhere. The speakers were garbage from day one. What waste of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: good monitor
customer_reviews.text: comes packaged well but without a box so if in a bad area have someone watching for package as its a beacon to thieves on a porch... hooks up fast but so far i haven't got speakers to work. (I have mult sound card outputs on my pc though so likely a driver issue on machine) There are other options at this price point and of course i noticed something i liked better 5 hours b4 this showed up but overall I am happy with Monitor and performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: What More Could You Want?
customer_reviews.text: I want to start my review off by letting you know I'm not a major tech nerd. I know what works for what I need, and in this case, this monitor surpasses them. I have an older monitor next to this one and there is no comparison. This monitor is super crispy clear and the colors are perfect. I do a lot of watching movies/videos but I also game quite a bit. I've never had any issues with this monitor and I've had it for 2+ years. I also really appreciate the duel HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.author: Shiann Dobalo

customer_reviews.title: After having this monitor for less than 6 months it ...
customer_reviews.text: After having this monitor for less than 6 months it is flashing on and off. According to all we have read about monitors, it is toast. We are very unhappy. Also you have no way to contact the company for any repair or replacement. WINDOWS CLOSED!
customer_reviews.author: JACKIEB

customer_reviews.title: Great for home office.
customer_reviews.text: We already had one of these. We expanded my wife's home office and added a second monitor. These quality monitors are designed for serious computers. They have mounting holes on the back for easy wall bracket mounting. Buying a second identical monitor speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gugel

customer_reviews.title: AOC is stepping up their game
customer_reviews.text: I had the perception that AOC made cheap and bad quality monitor and TVs, that is no more. The base of this monitor is metallic, the rest is plastic. The screen is mate and full hd, great colors, no so good for design but can get the job done. The best is the almost frameless design and the two HDMI ports so I can switch between my laptop and my Xbox/Chromecast quite easily. Wish a USB port, being able to move the screen up and down. No speakers but a headphone jack is available.
customer_reviews.author: Josué

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for 11 months, until half the screens starts flickering
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these about 11 months ago and really liked them. They have plenty of settings and the picture is nice. I have been getting a little screen tearing, but I figured it might be because I'm running some games at pretty high settings. The Problem: I woke up this morning and both of my 2 AOC monitors have about half of the screens flickering. I've tried switching cables, changing settings, switching graphics card ports. Nothing works. My other two monitors of different brands are fine. Other people have had the exact same issue, which is really suspicious. I'll update the rating based on if I can get some sort of positive response.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Worst monitor I've used in 20 years.Terrible viewing angles, horrible color shift at even minor off-axis viewing. This is ironic, considering that's supposed to be one of the big advantages to IPS. Worst motion blurring I've ever seen. Slow scrolling on long web pages was like a bad acid trip. Additionally, 1 of the 2 monitors I ordered flipped out less than 2 days in and displayed what appeared to be static, then developed a shudder that never fully went away. Returned and bought regular LED-lit LCD monitors and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: ... three years and this one is by far the best. The brightness and contrast controls are responsive and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased eight AOL monitors over the last three years and this one is by far the best. The brightness and contrast controls are responsive and provided me with the range I have been looking for. I prefer a dark screen rather than the bright white. While the other AOC monitors provided that same adjustment they would not darken as much as this one so it's perfect for me so I ordered another one! The super thin bezels are great too and the on/off light is a muted green not a glaring bright blue like most. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great definition but that blinking can be a bit hard ...
customer_reviews.text: can see the computer screen blinking that you usually only see in video, Great definition but that blinking can be a bit hard on the eyes over extended use. Also both HDMI ports do not work.. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: derrick beale

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Was really great, for the 5 months it worked. Will not respond to input on any of the ports now, just says no signal regardless of what input it is set to and what is connected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: So good for its price.
customer_reviews.text: 10/10. This is my third monitor for browsing/discord. I bought it with Amazon basic LCD monitor riser, and they're perfect for each others- I can use it in either Landscape mode or portrait mode. (Except for the fact that the monitor bar is non detachable) I have 27 inch DELL G-Sync monitor (TN) and 27 inch ASUS IPS monitor, And this is the cheapest, yet delivers the same or better smoothness/precision than the other two monitors. I did not even have to calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: Jin H. Park

customer_reviews.title: I like the monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like the monitor, but it's hard to figure out how to plug in your external PC speakers and get the speakers of the monitor to work at the same time. I've looked online and I still can't figure it out, so I have just external PC speakers playing, which is a waste of speakers on the monitor. That should be plug and play into the back of the monitor but it doesn't work that way, for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Counsellor

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor but the softward wouldnt download.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the monitor colors, size, clarity, but I have an HP computer (good processor, three years old) and it will not download the driver software. I find the buttons ( not very deep) in the back to be uncmfortable to work from the front.. I'm reasonably computer savvy and have not had this problem before. So I called AOC twice but neither technician could figure out a way to resolve the problem, using the disc or with a separate emailed download. They said this happens sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Suziesilverado

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 27" and it's amazing. I hooked it up to my mid-2011 MacBook Pro without issue via thunderbolt-HDMI adapter cable and it worked instantly with no issues in color or resolution. Netflix looks amazing, though I'm not crazy about the speakers so I still use the external speakers I've been using for a while. For the low cost, not using the speakers is a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Liffick

customer_reviews.title: AOC is AOK
customer_reviews.text: So I grabbed two of these on sale and I love them. I was weary of the brand as I've never heard of it but all screens are made from a select few companies. The specs are great so I though why not. Amazon will take anything back, right? Well these are keepers. I've watched movies on it from Netflix and my Plex server and they look great. I don't game so I can't say to how well that looks but spreadsheets are amazing on it and that's what really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor right out of the box. No issues. It is not completely borderless though. It looks like it until you turn it on, then there is about a half inch border on both sides and the top. Still a great monitor for the money. It does not have speakers, but I have found monitor speakers to be less than adequate and tinny sounding anyway, so I bought a pair of Amazon Basic speakers and they are fine for my purposes. Would definitely buy again and have no problem recommending this monitor to anyone who is looking for a good monitor at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: OhioPrexie

customer_reviews.title: Failure of Screen in less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I started using the AOC Screen in the middle of November 2016. It has started making a noise and has red lines flickering on the screen. I've bought multiple screens for my business. This is the first time in the 21 years of my business that the monitor or screen has failed before at least 5 years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Julienne Moore

customer_reviews.title: the other screen works fine but I can't do my job using one screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these monitors for my home office. I kept them in the box for about a month before using them. Now, just 1 month of use and one of them makes a popping noise and the screen goes black. I have to turn it off and on each time for it to work again. Over the past week, I'm having to do this multiple times a day and this incident happens more and more each day. Luckily, the other screen works fine but I can't do my job using one screen. Of course, I am already past the 30 day window for returns. I would not buy again or advise anyone to buy this particular monitor.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great display, not-so-much great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking my new AOC monitor; very good display - color, brightness, resolution, etc. I was hoping the sound would be a little better. Cannot compare at all with the sound my iMac. I wasn't expecting it to be great, but it should be better than it is. Still, for a nice monitor with sound capabilities, it is a good option that I would recommend unless you need great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Giova

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, just trying to optimize display
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is sexy. In so far as a monitor candy. It is bright and clear and very professional looking. The speakers are subpar but if you're looking for any kind of entertainment you should have external speakers anyway. I only have one concern and I'm trying to work through it. Because of the very wide width of this monitor, many of the webpages and forms I filled out during the course of my job or a little blurry. Trying to figure out the resolution. Other than that it is a great monitor
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cregan

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It is exactly what i was looking for. Most important was the review that said you can just set it directly on the desk without the stand. Have not tried the built in speakers to be fair - wasn't why i bought the display. This works perfectly. Un-boxed it this afternoon, added it to my Win10 1607 build Lenovo X240 via mini-display port to HDMI without any software install - love the image crystal clear for $129 hard to beat. Now i need to find something to "carry it" in when i travel. :D
customer_reviews.author: Lori Yoder

customer_reviews.title: ... some of the negative reviews and thought "thats too bad, but it happens"
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review before but realized it was user error. The directions are practically useless, and the power button is on the back of the monitor. On the right side of the monitor you see the symbols so you assume its touch sensitive and touch the symbols but nothing happens. You have to reach to the back for the buttons. the quality looks pretty good. It isn't going to rock your world, but it is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wowzer83

customer_reviews.title: Great picture on the monitor but the sound sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this monitor is outstanding, plus I love the way it fits on my computer desk. The only problem I have is with the internal speakers. I hear them OK, but it's just no bass in the sound. As a result, I decided to purchase the Frisby FS-210NU USB 2.0 Computer PC Laptop Notebook Desktop Portable Speakers from Amazon. So many people like the sound coming from those small speakers that I decided to purchase them and hear for myself. At any rate I still think this monitor is a great purchase for the money. It would have received 5 stars had it not been for the speakers on it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great Clarity, Definitely not Frameless though
customer_reviews.text: If you pay close attention to the pictures you will notice that while the bezel of the monitor would appear frameless when the monitor is actually on you have about a half inch of black border around your screen. It does not bother me as the screen clarity is unmatched. If you find that the monitor is tilting to one side the you can easily lean it to one side and correct it. The in monitor speakers are what they are...nothing spectacular but if you expect spectacular sound from in monitor speakers, well, you shouldn't... Really am liking the monitor overall, the finishing touches go nicely on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: The best most durable monitor Ive ever thrown. Theres a power button on the back if it doesnt come on for you- just keep looking the buttons are hard to find
customer_reviews.author: alanca03

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor. Very bright and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Monitor. Very bright and easy to read. Great for games. I use multiple monitors and i love the thin side bezels. Only minor complaint is I wish it either didn't sit so high or the height was adjustable. I have older Asus monitor next to it and had to put something under the stand to get them even.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Quann

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best 23" IPS at this price point available right now
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best 23" IPS at this price point available right now. Great thin monitor, takes up very little space, excellent color display and calibration. All-in-all, display quality is very good, and you are not going to find a better monitor at this price point. One caveat: don't buy this expecting good speakers. They are quite bad (but you shouldn't be buying a monitor for speakers anyway!), and the rest of the product is great. A small issue: if you need to make constant settings changes to your display, you will probably get frustrated with the awkward button placement on this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter IPS
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice screen, works well for gaming/movies, works well with text for programming too. Sound is not great but better than many LCD's I have heard. The IPS does work well, I let my son watch Netflix while I am doing other things, and I am surprised how well it looks when looking at it from a sharp angle. Price :-) Cons: No DVI input. The menus are a real pain. Stand could have been a bit taller/or could have had height adjustment (I had to stick a programming book under it to get it to a good height) Its not 3D /wink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say, you get what you pay for. Higher frame rate games look horrible on this monitor so you have to cap yourself and I still see tearing at 60fps which apparently this clunker should do fine. It's an adequate monitor but I'm writing this review because just 3 months in and I'm about to go buy a new actual gaming monitor. I got sucked in by the price but I did not do my research. it's worth buying if you just need a big monitor for cheap but after using my really nice work laptop a lot, I've gotten tired of my pixely ass, brand new, monitor.
customer_reviews.author: heath

customer_reviews.title: Much better TV than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much better TV than I expected. Replaced an HDTV of the same size that was around 5 years old and much more expensive, and it's leagues clearer and brighter--even without the age of the older tv taken into account.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Faint lines scrolling across screen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these along with a 1440 AOC, Agon monitor. The Agon was great, but both of the i2769s have faint vertical lines that dance across the monitor. I've tried it with different cables, different drivers, and two different video cards. Still, I see these faint lines that seem to scroll across the screen. Never seen anything like it. I can hide them on light surfaces by turning DPS mode off, but it makes them more visible on darker surfaces, especially greys/blues. It drives me crazy. So upsetting I'm thinking about returning the 1440k with these two 1080 turds.
customer_reviews.author: redgar

customer_reviews.title: Requires Mounting Adapter Sold Separately
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3x of these units for a customer wanting a wall mount option which these do support but only with the additional purchase of a special mounting bracket sold separately for $30 a pop. The units feature 2x HDMI inputs and 1x VGA but they only include the VGA cable and not HDMI so you will have to pick those up separate as well. All in all a good monitor but bad setup experience cause of the missing hardware, I would gladly pay more for the monitor if they would just include all the parts to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow2359

customer_reviews.title: ... monitor for a few months now and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for a few months now and I'm very happy with it. Colors are good after some minor tweaking, overall a beautiful panel. As others have said, the stand is kind of flimsy but unless you plan on shaking/kicking your desk a lot then it wont be a problem. Don't bother installing the software for it, its completely unnecessary/useless. Would buy another one if I had the need to.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture, bright
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture, bright, rim as ultra-thin - barely any bezel at all. And not heavy, so was easy to mount on the wall. Get the VESA adaptor for this model if you plan to use a wall mount.It's worth the money to have the right hardware for the job.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor except for the speakers
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is really nice. Great screen quality, size, and details associated with it. It would be 5 stars if it wasn't for the speakers. The speakers aren't bad, but they sure aren't great. Kinda quiet and no bass at all. But overall for the price, this is a great quality choice.
customer_reviews.author: A'shia Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this monitor for roughly a year now and it works great. For the price and it's slim design, you can't get a much better value! Over the past year, it has come into contact with various sharp edges and forceful impacts but the monitor remains to work great with very slim noticeable scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is everything it claims to be. Better colors than a TN panel with a very respectable response time. Acceptable for casual gamers, unless you are playing a high level twitch game this monitor should be great. Mine came very well calibrated out of the box. The only complaint is that the cable that comes with is not very long. Although most monitor cables are this way. The monitor itself looks beautiful with its small bezels. And you can tilt it up and down quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I still use this to this day, I've had it for three years now. It was a great monitor back then but now it doesn't match the quality of any other monitor on the market. But, it held up nicely and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: kgella

customer_reviews.title: Great 1080P Monitor! Small Bezels! 23 Inch great with 1080P.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these monitors so far. I plan on buying a third for a 3 monitor setup. They look great. Would recommend if you have an okay PC and want 3 monitors. Screens pretty bright. One thing I did wrong I thought there was plastic over the screen which there is not. So don't try to scrape it off its part of the screen. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: monitor looks great design-wise and picture quality-wise. I have a 2013 macbook pro retina and I still think the monitor looks great. contrast is great, resolution is great. awesome that it includes built in speakers and two hdmi outputs. Build quality is solid for the price. There is of course a third inch black space between the sides and top of the screen so it isn't truly frameless but then again what monitor is? Especially at this price point. Great monitor for the price, great monitor overall. Looking to get another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was fantastic and I sent it back in that same day ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but the first one i bought broke within 4 hours of the first use. i am guessing it was a defective screen and that is why i still gave it a 4. That stuff happens understandably. Amazon was fantastic and I sent it back in that same day and received a new one two days later. I have had that one for over 6 months without a single complaint... The sound is not that great but lets be honest, you are not buying this for its great sound features
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the picture is very vibrant. The speaker is the only low point, but I do not expect a monitor to have a great speaker. The audio output for headphones is very nice as my computer is not very close to the monitor. Love it so far, will update if any issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: AOC delivers a winning Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Almost anything that can be written relative to its brilliance is truly an understatement regarding this monitor!! customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Cheap mount.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the AOC IPS i2367Fh monitor. The monitor arrived in a few days with standard shipping in perfect shape, having been very well packaged. It is sharp, has wonderful accurate colors. and was easy to set up. I don't see any dead pixels or other anomalies.The only quibble that I have is with the cheap mount. I knew from other reviews that the mount had some shortcomings, but I planned to upgrade to a better, more flexible mount. It turns out that the i2367Fh doesn't even have standard mounting holes for another mount. This wasn't a deal killer, just a disappointment.

product_meta.title: AOC i2367Fh 23-Inch IPS Frameless LED-Lit Monitor, Full HD 1080p, 5ms, 50M:1 DCR, VGA/ HDMI, Speakers, Multi Purpose Stand
product_meta.description:
Open box like new AOC 23in widescreen LED monitor. Scan Frequency 30-99KHz (kiloHertz) / 50-76Hz (Hertz) .

AMAZON.COM





Removable dual-function stand.


AOC I2367FH 23-INCH CLASS ULTRASLIM WIDESCREEN IPS LED MONITOR
23" ULTRA-NARROW BEZEL LED MONITOR WITH IPS PANEL OFFERS BETTER PICTURE QUALITY, COLOR ACCURACY AND EXTENDED VIEWING ANGLES
The i2367Fh monitor is an ultra slim 23" monitor at only 12mm thick and the display's ultra-narrow bezel measures just 2mm, for a borderless appearance that is ideally suited for use in dual monitor or multiple monitor setups. This sleek display features an IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel, a superior type of screen that offers consistent image appearance, higher definition, better color accuracy and greater light transmission from all viewing positions.



KEY FEATURES
 * 2mm ultra-narrow bezel for a virtually borderless appearance
 * Ultra-thin IPS Panel for consistent image appearance from all viewing position
 * Non-reflective matte anti-glare coating that won't leave smudges or fingerprints on the screen
 * Full HD display with 1920 x 1080 maximum resolution
 * 5ms response time for smooth motion playback
 * Multimedia connectors with VGA and 2 HDMI inputs
 * Detachable multi-purpose stand for standard or photo frame applications



Side view of the ultra-slim and lightweight design of the e2251Fwu. ATTRACTIVE ULTRA-SLIM DESIGN
AOC's i2367Fh has an sleek, ultra-slim design with an appearance of no top and side bezels. The screen itself has a matte anti-glare coating that won't leave fingerprints or smudges. The ultra-thin IPS Panel allows you to view your spreadsheets or weekend movies from virtually any angle without compromising color uniformity. The buttons are located on the lower-right of the back panel and easily accessible.

DESIGNED TO MEET YOUR NEEDS
The i2367Fh features a 23" viewable screen and a 1920 x 1080 widescreen full HD, boasting 50,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and response time of 5ms. You can play games or watch movies without seeing any drag. With the detachable stand removed, the monitor can be used for photo frame applications as well.

STAY CONNECTED
The i2367Fh comes with a VGA and two HDMI inputs for you to connect to your devices. HDMI connects high-definition audio and video in one single cord to other devices, such as video game consoles, external monitors, and compatible TVs.

USER-FRIENDLY, ALL IN ONE
The i2367Fh is both Energy-Star and EPEAT Silver Certified for its green packaging and production. The display's LED backlight panel requires 50% less energy for low power consumption and is completely free of toxic Mercury. The display is also equipped with AOC's e-Saver software that lets the user preset power conservation modes for the display when the PC is not in use. The monitor also has user friendly OSD menu, Power Saving Mode, and Off Timer.

Additionally, the monitor includes the iMenu option, which allows the user to change settings using only the keyboard and mouse; and Screen+ software that divides the screen into four self-contained work areas for improved productivity.

TECH SPECIFICATIONS
 * Panel: LED Backlit - LED AH-IPS Panel
 * Viewable Image Size: 23"
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9 
 * Brightness: 250 cd/m2
 * Contrast Ratio: 50,000,000:1 
 * Response Time: 5ms 
 * Viewable Angle: 178 degrees horizontal, 178 degrees vertical 
 * Optimum Resolution: 1920 x 1080 @60Hz 
 * Colors Supported: 16.7 Million 
 * Connectors: VGA, HDMI with HDCP (2x)
 * Windows 8 Compatible: Yes
